title: An Army Of Meter Socket Adapters Is Coming For Your Fossil Fuels
description:
The US startup ConnectDER is bringing its meter socket adapters to millions of households, helping to reduce the cost of rooftop solar, home energy storage, and EV charging stations.

The post An Army Of Meter Socket Adapters Is Coming For Your Fossil Fuels appeared first on CleanTechnica.
